content: I apologize for the error in my previous response. Upon further research, it appears that the Toilevator is no longer available for purchase from the manufacturer's website ([www.gosafe.com](http://www.gosafe.com)) or their authorized distributors. The product page for the Toilevator on the manufacturer's website indicates that it has been discontinued and is no longer being produced or sold. However, the website still contains information about the Toilevator, including installation instructions and product specifications, for reference purposes.
